content: now you can crochet a set of fabulous and thick pot holders 1 in a charming design with bubbles the pot holders are made with hobbii snowstorm 2 and felted in the washing machine enjoy **materials ** - crochet hook size l/11 - hobbii snowstorm - 18 cm leather cord optional **measurements ** approx 8-8 5 inch read the section before and after felting **supplies ** approx 80 g for each **abbreviations** **magic_ring** magic_ring **chain** chain stitch **st** stitch **single_crochet** single_crochet **slip_stitch** slip_stitch **double_crochet** double_crochet **bst** bubble stitch 1 https //hobbii com/pot-holders-with-bubbles utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=pot-holder-with-bubbles&utm_term=swr 2 https //hobbii com/snowstorm utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=product&utm_content=snowstorm&utm_term=swr
